snippet: There is so much you cannot do at the site of the Masters, it is a wonder the place was not named the Country Club of No.
abstract: There are so many rules and restrictions at Augusta National Golf Club, home of the Masters, it would be more aptly named Country Club of No.
lead_paragraph: There is so much you cannot do at the site of the Masters, it is a wonder the place was not named the Country Club of No.

headline.seo: Masters — At Augusta National, if You Have to Ask, the Answer Is No
headline.main: At Augusta, if You Have to Ask, The Answer Is No. So Don’t Ask.
headline.print_headline: At Augusta, if You Have to Ask, The Answer Is No. So Don’t Ask.
